attributes.additional_details: Animal suffering should never be hidden. Let’s bring honesty to the label and lgive people the power to choose kindness.
attributes.background:
Introduce mandatory front-of-pack labels on all products tested on animals
Close the legal loopholes that allow animal testing to continue behind the scenes, particularly in supply chains
Invest in cruelty-free research and commit to a national plan to phase out animal testing

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Require clearer labelling of animal-derived ingredients
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733222
